summary.para: [The feature associated with this page, DirectShow, is a legacy feature. It has been superseded by MediaPlayer, , and Audio/Video Capture in Media Foundation. Those features have been optimized for Windows 10 and Windows 11. Microsoft strongly recommends that new code use MediaPlayer, IMFMediaEngine and Audio/Video Capture in Media Foundation instead of DirectShow, when possible. Microsoft suggests that existing code that uses the legacy APIs be rewritten to use the new APIs if possible.]
Specifies chroma resolution. This enumeration is used with the AVEncVideoInputChromaResolution and AVEncVideoOutputChromaResolution properties.

member.name: eAVEncVideoChromaResolution.eAVEncVideoChromaResolution_SameAsSource
member.summary: Use the same chroma resolution as the input video. This flag applies to the AVEncVideoOutputChromaResolution property only.

member.name: eAVEncVideoChromaResolution.eAVEncVideoChromaResolution_422
member.summary: 4:2:2 (2:1 horizontal downsampling, with no vertical downsampling).

member.name: eAVEncVideoChromaResolution.eAVEncVideoChromaResolution_411
member.summary: 4:1:1 (4:1 horizontal downsampling, with no vertical downsampling).
